nodes.html: <input type="email" name="registration[email]" id="registration-email" value="" placeholder="max.mustermann@gmx.ch" data-parsley-pattern="/^(.+@){1}(?!meineinkauf\.ch)(?!meinkauf\.de)(?!meinkauf\.ch)(?!(meineinkau(.+)))(?!einkauf\.ch)(?!meineeinkauf\.ch)(?!meineinkaufe\.ch)(?!meinekauf\.ch)(?!meinenkauf\.ch)(?!MeinEnkauf\.ch)(?!meinienkauf\.ch)(([a-z0-9]+(-[a-z0-9]+)*\.)+[a-z]{2,})$/i" data-parsley-pattern-message="@MeinEinkauf.ch Email Adressen können nicht registriert werden." required="" maxlength="255" data-parsley-remote="" data-parsley-remote-validator="mailboxlayer">

passes.help: id attribute value must be unique

any.message: Document has no static elements that share the same id attribute

passes.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
passes.help: Headings should not be empty

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div > main > article > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div > div > header:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div > h4:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
